name: EVA: Battle For Survival
description:
EVA (as in Extra Vehicular Activity) is a local death-match game. There is no solo, but you can play it alone to train all you want.

After weathering a passing asteroid, not-so-friendly astronauts have to go outside the space station to repair. It was then that their board computer announces that there is only food and oxygen left for one person. The astronauts will therefore settle the score to know who will survive.

Controls :

Left stick : Orientate the character
A : Speed up
B : Slow down
RT : Fire (hold to burst fire)
X : Reload
Start : Go back to title
D-Pad : Select options in main menu

Disclaimer :

The controls are controller-only.
You need an Xbox 360/One controller. If you are using another controller, you need to find a software to emulate the Xbox 360 controller, such as x360ce.

This game is an early prototype made in a short amount of time. Their is no plan for further development at the moment.
